headline: VICI Properties: Virtually Tariff-Proof And Growing Like A Weed
summary: VICI Properties is a well-priced, diversified commercial REIT with a robust 5.4% yield. Read why I think VICI stock is a buy.

headline: American Tower Corp. Is Too Expensive In A Struggling Market
summary: American Tower is a $100 billion REIT with a high P/E ratio and stagnant revenue growth, making it an underperformer. Read why AMT stock has a sell rating.
